title: Creamy Mexican pasta salad
ingredients: ['450g dried fusilli pasta', '375g chunky salsa', '250ml mayonnaise', '125ml soured cream', '1 (400g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '1 1/2 (198g) tins sweetcorn with peppers, drained', '65g chopped red pepper', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '75g sliced black olives', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried coriander or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste']
